Entries.companionAccepted_Dating: Of course I'd go with you.$h
Entries.companionAccepted_Spouse: Why yes, I'd follow you to the ends of the worlds.$l
Entries.companionRejected: It's a no can do for me.#$b#I've got stuff to do right now.
Entries.companionRejected_Dating: Sorry, @. I have to check the lines around town.#$b#Maybe tomorrow?
Entries.companionRejected_Spouse: Oh, sorry!$u#$b#I didn't know you needed me today. I have errands to run.$s
Entries.companionRejectedNight: Isn't it kind of late?#$b#Then why are you asking me to accompany you?$6
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Dating: It's kind of late now.#$b#I need to go home, I'm sorry.$s
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Spouse: I apologize uhh... Darling.$s#$b#I'm kind of tired tonight.#$b#I'll just see you at home alright? Our robot-babies and I will be waiting.$h
Entries.companionDismiss: Well, that's done.#$b#I'm off on my own now. Bye, @!
Entries.companionDismiss_Dating: Okay, I'm glad I was able to help out.$h#$b#Bye now! I'll see you tomorrow?$h
Entries.companionDismiss_Spouse: Are you sure you don't need anything else?#$b#Alright, I'm off!$h#$b#%Kenneth kisses you on the cheek.#$b#Uhm... Goodbye, I'll see you at home.$l
Entries.companionDismissAuto: Oh would you look at the time.#$b#I should be getting home, @.#$b#Good night.$h
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Dating: It's getting a bit late.#$b#It's not good to be out this late.$6#$b#I'll go ahead, alright? We'll see each other tomorrow okay?$l
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Spouse: Darling, it's getting late.#$b#I'll go ahead and head back.#$b#Be safe, alright?$h
Entries.companionRecruited: So, what do you need my company for?
Entries.companionRecruited_Dating: Where are we off to, @?#$b#I kind of like it when we spend time together.$l
Entries.companionRecruited_Spouse: Are we going on a hike today?#$b#Do you need me to build you a hoverboard for easy transportation?
Entries.giveForages: I found this thing, and I think you could use this.#$b#Here you go!$h
Entries.heal: Oh, here! I have something that could help you out!$u
Entries.nomedkits: My robot medic is still recharging.$s
Entries.farmerRunAway_Dating: You're so fast! Jeez, slow down!$u
Entries.giveForages_Dating: Hey, @! Here, have some of this.$h
Entries.heal_Dating: Oh, you're hurt!$u#$b#I have just the the thing for you, here.$h
Entries.nomedkits_Dating: My robot medic is still recharging.$s
Entries.farmerRunAway_Spouse: Slow down! What's got you running so fast? Jeez!$6
Entries.giveForages_Spouse: Darling, I found this and I think you could use it.#$b#I think it might be helpful.$h
Entries.heal_Spouse: Oh no!$u#$b#Here's something to help with the pain!$s
Entries.nomedkits_Spouse: My robot medic is still recharging.$s
Entries.companion_Farm: The farm looks nice from this view.
Entries.companion_Farm~1: Hmm, street lights would look good in your walkways.$6
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy: Oh no!$u#$b#My gadgets are going to get wet!$u
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy: Hmm...$6#$b#%Kenneth seems deep in thought.#$b#Maybe I should build a transportable heater.
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring: The crops sprouting in your farm would do good in a well-built case or chest if you'd prefer.
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer: It's hot here.$u#$b#I hope the plants don't wither and die.$s
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall: You could make compost bins for the fallen leaves.#$b#It's great for the environment.
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter: What are your preparations for springtime?
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night: Uhh, what are we doing here at night?$u
Entries.companion_Farm_Night: You know torches along the pathways are a big help at night time.
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating: I'm getting the sense that you're a better farmer than I thought you'd be.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating~1: You're doing good in your farm, @.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Dating: It's quite tough working on a rainy day.#$b#I'm glad that I can spend this with you, instead of searching for something else to do.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Dating: It's pretty cold out here, @.#$b#Why don't you come here so I can keep you warm.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring_Dating: The farm looks really taken care of.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer_Dating: The soil looks kind of dry, @.#$b#Would you like for me to install a watering device here?
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Dating: I could fashion an industrial leaf blower to make cleaning the leaves easy.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Dating: The farm kind of looks barren during winter.$u#$b#Do you think we... Umm, I can do something about it?$s
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Dating: Oh wow, this is nice, @.$h#$b#It looks as nice as the robot-dog I'm building!$h#$b#And... Umm...$l#$b#You...$l
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night_Dating: What are you going to do to me here at night?$6#$b#Haha, just kidding!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Night_Dating: It feels peaceful here, doesn't it?#$b#It's peaceful with you.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse: It's amazing how our farm turned out.$h#$b#You're doing a good job.$h#$b#I'm sorry if I don't know much about farm work.$s#$b#If you'd like, I could build you a conveyor belt to help the process of stuff easier.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse~1: Do you think our farm would benefit from a set of hoverboards?#$b#Wouldn't it be cool to offer one to each of our guests to use when they go around the farm?$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Spouse: I used to get so upset that my gadgets keep on getting wet during the rain...#$b#Now, I put them in a waterproof case.$h#$b#It's so I can stay out in the rain with you.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Spouse: It's quite cold out, darling.#$b#Would you like a hug to keep you warm?$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring_Spouse: Spring looks just as pretty as you.$l#$b#Huh? what?$u#$b#Nothing, I said spring looks pretty in our farm.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer_Spouse: Darling, you're sweating a lot.#$b#Do you want me to make a handy fan for you?#$b#Or I could just blow in your face to help.$l#$b#I promise, I brushed my teeth!$u
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Spouse: The seasons are starting to get colder.#$b#%Kenneth looks at you intently.#$b#I can think of a few ways to keep you warm, darling.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Spouse: We can make snow robots in the snow!$h#$b#YAY!!!$h
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Spouse: It's amazing how much work went into this farm.$h#$b#I'm glad you're loving what you're doing, darling.$h
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night_Spouse: Home at last.$h#$b#I can't wait to get into bed and ask the robot to give us some drinks and spend the rest of the night with you.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Night_Spouse: %Kenneth holds out a blanket for you.#$b#It's chilly out here, darling.#$b#Are you okay?
Entries.companion_Town_Rainy: Oh, my shoes are wet.#$b#Aw.$s#$b#Anyway, where to?
Entries.companion_Town_Night: Is that lamp working fine?#$b#Hmm....$6#$b#I'll make sure to especially look at it tomorrow.$6
Entries.companion_Town_Night~1: My lamps look good.#$b#Yes, they're good.#$b#Hmm...#$b#Too good...$6
Entries.companion_Town: I wonder if who installed the automatic switch for the lamps before I arrived here.#$b#They must've been a genius since the mechanism was something I haven't seen before.#$b#Almost like it was made from scratch.
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVill: I wonder where Howdy is.$6#$b#I swear that robot has a mind of its own.$6#$b#Oh, don't believe any nonsense it says, trust me.$h
I check the village lamps every early morning long before the sun rises.#$b#It's really peaceful.$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel: The lights here sometimes flicker.#$b#Richard has me investigating the source of the problem and it's always broken wires.#$b#Some mouse in the walls must have been chewing them.#$b#We had an exterminator visit the place though, but they didn't find any.#$b#It's such a mystery.
Entries.companion_Forest: I once proposed a lumberjack-bot project to the towns here in the valley.#$b#But no one appreciated the idea since it looked and sounded scary.#$b#It's alright though, I understand what they feel.#$b#I turned the project into a dig-bot instead, but I lost control of it in my first test run.#$b#It might be underground somewhere in the valley.#$b#I wonder how it's doing.$6
Entries.companion_ScienceHouse: Demetrius showed me a bunch of his petri dish of bacteria and whatever.#$b#I didn't understand any word he said at all.$s#$b#I think he didn't notice though, I just nodded and did this face.#$b#I'm talking about this face.$6
Entries.companionSuggest: Ehm, excuse me but can I come with you while you do stuff?#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Dating: Hey, @? Would it be okay if I tag along? I need a break from all my tech stuff.$u#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Spouse: Hey, umm... Darling? Would it be okay if I go with you today? I kind of miss hanging out with you.$l#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes: Oh, cool. Thanks. I just really need to figure things out right now, maybe a walk with you will help.$h
Entries.companionSuggest_No: Alright then, I'll just go ahead.
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes_Dating: Nice!$h#$b#Maybe our venture could spark something in me.$h
Entries.companionSuggest_No_Dating: Hmm.$6#$b#Haha, just kidding. We can do it next time, @.$h
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes_Spouse: Cool cool cool.$h#$b#We can look for places to put zip lines all over town!$h
Entries.companionSuggest_No_Spouse: Aww.$s#$b#Okay darling, we'll just see each other later.
